briefTitle: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy With WH002 in Women With HER2-negative Breast Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase Ib Randomized Parallel Study of Comparing WH002 With Paclitaxel Both Sequential of Epirubicin and Cyclophosphamide As Neoadjuvant Treatment of Women With HER2-Negative Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: All reported adverse events, serious adverse events and the percentage of drug-related adverse events, serious adverse events during the treatment period.
